item.title: Automatic Travel Mode Prediction in a National Travel Survey
item.description: Laurent Smeets, Peter Lugtig, Barry Schouten, CBS discussion paper (2019) This paper shows the potential of automatic transport mode prediction in app-based surveys employing mobile device location sensors using machine learning. New relative to other studies is the use of a general population, official context of the survey, the size of the sample, the use of administrative registry data and number and types of features used.
